title: STEM-Integrated E-Learning Design Course for Enhancing Creative Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics) concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: STEM-integrated training program for corporate managers/leaders to enhance problem-solving capabilities in social domains

learning_goals: Creative problem-solving e-learning content can be designed by applying the ADDIE model-based instructional design process.
Five or more creative thinking strategies for solving real-life problems through STEM integration can be explained.
Effective e-learning simulations that interact with large-scale learners can be implemented using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
